As the Predacons head down the hall they hear Void says what he said.

   "Or we could just put a bomb by his spark and never have him 
attack our ship again."  Lobstruck says.

   During this time Snake Eyes Sends a Comm through out the whole 
ship, "Will Everyone pleasshe report to the bridge?"

   Lobstruck then sends a comm. to UltraByte, "Hey UltraByte, we got 
the intruder."

   UltraByte then replies, "Well put him in statius hold for now,"

   "I want to put bombs by his spark, make him one of us."  Lobstruck 
says.

   "Well put him in the statius hold and then later you can work on 
that."  UltraByte says.

   "Yes Sir."  Lobstruck says as he turns towards the other 
predacons, "Changes of plans, lets move him to the staius hold."

   THe Predacons then start to walk towards the staius holds. 

  


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Void Simpyl stands the for a moment as the acidic cloud and the 
acid itself 
> all just dissapear. Void then follows Losturck and keeps his eye on 
thirst.
> 
> Void: "Place it in a stasis pod and keep it in permanent stasis. 
That thing 
> should never see the light of day."
